description:
Hoping to use the Kero Ball to fix his broken Gundam models, Keroro accidentally manages to copy himself... again and again and again.  With thousands of Keroros at his command, he thinks conquering the Earth should be a snap.  But these Keroros also have his utterly lazy personality...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Panic! Hinata-ke no Motto mo Sawagashii Ichinichi de Arimasu
パニック! 日向家の最も騒がしい一日 であります
